item.title: About Me
item.description: Name: Han Xiao Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree: Public Health in Peking University, 2017-2022 Master’s degree: Epidemiology & Biostatistics in Peking University, since 2022 Academic Interests: Aging Genetics Multi-omics Chronic disease epidemiology Selected Publications Xiao H, et al. Disease patterns of coronary heart disease and type 2 diabetes harbored distinct and shared genetic architecture. Cardiovasc Diabetol. 2022;21(1):276. Li X, Xiao H, et al. Identifying novel genetic loci associated with polycystic ovary syndrome based on its shared genetic architecture with type 2 diabetes.

item.title: Contact

item.title: Tips for creating your own website
item.description: Recommended tutorial (in Chinese): https://cuttontail.blog/blog/create-a-wesite-using-github-pages-and-hugo/ https://www.sulvblog.cn/posts/blog/build_hugo/ https://chance7bin.github.io/posts/note/ Speed-limit-steps to me When creating Github repository, click the option for Readme.md option, this make sure your repository will have a “main” branch. After pushing the public file created by hugo to your Github repository, remember to active Github Pages by by running Jekyll workflows first, otherwise our website would still be 404. The VPN stuff for me is in chaos, sometimes I cannot link to github though I have used a VPN.
